name: Dinner Tonight: Carrot Mint Salad with Currants
description: I’ve been stashing Fresh Food Fast on my crowded book shelf for ages, incurring pesky library fees, and generally not getting much from the interaction. It’s okay, not every cookbook needs lights my fire, but I had had hopes about...

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk together the lemon juice, olive oil, mint, and chives. Season with salt.
Combine the carrots and dried currants, tossing until mixed.
Pour the vinaigrette over the salad and toss.
